1217250.name: Supermarket Simulator
1217250.description:
This is a game about buying groceries in a supermarket.
No really, if you want the most realistic experience of buying groceries in a supermarket, then this is your game. You can even ride a trolley like you used to do as a kid.

This game features three modes:

Casual
You literally just walk around and let yourself be immersed in the grocery shopping experience.

Speedrunning
You're shopping against the clock, check off the entire list before the time runs out.

Shoplifting (TO BE IMPLEMENTED DURING EA)
Maybe you dont have any money, but you still have to survive right? this is the mode for you. Sneak around the store and take as much as you can carry without getting caught. Watch out though, the cashier is scary when she finds you...
1217250.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
